name: Outward Supplies
query: select tabInvoices.invoice_number as 'Invoice Number',tabInvoices.invoice_date as 'Invoice Date', DATE(tabInvoices.creation) as Date, if(tabInvoices.gst_number!='','Registered','Un-registered') as 'Type of Customer', tabInvoices.invoice_type as Type, tabInvoices.trade_name as 'Name of Client / Customer',tabInvoices.gst_number as 'Customer GSTIN / UIN', tabInvoices.pms_invoice_summary as 'Invoice value', tabInvoices.pms_invoice_summary_without_gst as 'Taxable Value', tabItems.gst_rate as RATE, tabItems.gst_rate as 'GST Rate', tabItems.igst as 'IGST Rate', tabItems.igst_amount as 'IGST Amount', tabItems.cgst as 'CGST Rate', tabItems.cgst_amount as 'CGST Amount', tabItems.sgst as 'SGST / UT Rate', tabItems.sgst_amount as 'SGST / UT GST Amount', tabItems.cess as 'GST Compensation Cess Rate', tabItems.cess_amount as 'GST Compensation Cess Amount',tabItems.cess_amount+tabItems.igst_amount+tabItems.sgst_amount+tabItems.cgst_amount as 'Sum of taxes', tabItems.sac_code as 'HSN', tabItems.item_name as 'UQC', "1" as Quantity from tabInvoices JOIN tabItems ON tabInvoices.name = tabItems.parent
